data.eml:eml: A new species of Pseudachorutes Tullberg (Collembola, Neanuridae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Shidi, Jiang, Jigang, Pan, Zhi-Xiang (2008): A new species of Pseudachorutes Tullberg (Collembola, Neanuridae) from China. Zootaxa 1755: 57-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181803
